title: Synergistic effect between In2O3 and ZrO2 in the reverse water gas shift reaction
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,14868-14874
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01372G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jiayu Dong, Hong Wang, Guofeng Zhao, Dong Jiang, Haitao Xu
The 75In2O3–25ZrO2 forms a solid solution structure, and can achieve 28% CO2 conversion and 96% CO selectivity during a 200 h-test.
